trans-unit.target: 此範例也會建立<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader>物件詳細資料檢視中顯示子項目。

trans-unit.source: Two <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> objects are also created in the code example to provide images for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> objects.
trans-unit.target: 兩個<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>物件也會建立在程式碼範例中提供的映像<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>物件。

trans-unit.source: These <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> objects are added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.LargeImageList%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SmallImageList%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 這些<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>物件加入至<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.LargeImageList%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SmallImageList%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The example uses the following properties in creating the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control:
trans-unit.target: 此範例會使用下列屬性建立<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>控制項：

trans-unit.source: This example requires that you have added the code to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> and call the method created in the example from the constructor or another method on the form.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例需要您已加入的程式碼<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>並呼叫從建構函式或在表單上的另一個方法範例中所建立的方法。

trans-unit.source: The example also requires that images named `MySmallImage1`, `MySmallImage2`, `MyLargeImage1`, and `MyLargeImage2` are located in the root directory of drive C.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例也會需要映像命名為`MySmallImage1`， `MySmallImage2`， `MyLargeImage1`，和`MyLargeImage2`位於 c 磁碟機的根目錄

trans-unit.source: Arranges items in the control when they are displayed as icons.
trans-unit.target: 控制項中的項目顯示為圖示時加以排列。

trans-unit.source: Arranges items in the control when they are displayed as icons based on the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Alignment" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 控制項中的項目按照 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Alignment" /> 屬性的值顯示成為圖示時，可加以排列。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ArrangeIcons%2A> method is only useful when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View.LargeIcon> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View.SmallIcon>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ArrangeIcons%2A>方法時，才有用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A>屬性設定為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.View.LargeIcon>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.View.SmallIcon>。

trans-unit.source: Calling this version of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ArrangeIcons%2A> method arranges the items based on the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Alignment%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫此版本的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ArrangeIcons%2A>方法排列的值為基礎的項目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Alignment%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: To cause the items to be aligned based on a value that differs from that of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Alignment%2A> property, use the other version of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ArrangeIcons%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要將導致對齊項目為主的值，不同於<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Alignment%2A>屬性，使用其他版本的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ArrangeIcons%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewAlignment" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewAlignment" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Arranges items in the control when they are displayed as icons with a specified alignment setting.
trans-unit.target: 控制項中的項目顯示為圖示時，用特定的對齊設定加以排列。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ArrangeIcons%2A> method is only useful when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View.LargeIcon> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View.SmallIcon>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ArrangeIcons%2A>方法時，才有用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A>屬性設定為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.View.LargeIcon>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.View.SmallIcon>。

trans-unit.source: This version of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ArrangeIcons%2A> method arranges the icons in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> based on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewAlignment> value specified in the `value` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 這個版本的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ArrangeIcons%2A>方法中排列圖示<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>根據<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewAlignment>中指定的值`value`參數。

trans-unit.source: Calling this method does not change the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Alignment%2A> property of the control.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫這個方法不會變更的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Alignment%2A>控制項的屬性。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to arrange icons on the control using a different value than that of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Alignment%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法用來將圖示排列在使用不同的值以外的控制項上<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Alignment%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: To cause the items to be aligned based on the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Alignment%2A> property, use the other version of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ArrangeIcons%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要導致要對齊的項目為基礎的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Alignment%2A>屬性，使用其他版本的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ArrangeIcons%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The value specified in the <paramref name="value" /> parameter is not a member of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewAlignment" /> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 參數中指定的數值並非 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewAlignment" /> 列舉型別 (Enumeration) 的成員。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets whether icons are automatically kept arranged.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定是否自動將圖示保持為已管理。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if icons are automatically kept arranged and snapped to the grid; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果自動將圖示保持為已管理並且貼齊格線，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.AutoArrange%2A> property only arranges items in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View.LargeIcon> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View.SmallIcon>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.AutoArrange%2A>屬性只會排列中的項目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>負責控制何時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A>屬性設定為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.View.LargeIcon>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.View.SmallIcon>。

trans-unit.source: To change the alignment of items in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Alignment%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要變更的項目中的對齊方式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>控制，請使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Alignment%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: You can use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.AutoArrange%2A> to ensure that all items in your <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control are automatically arranged to avoid overlapping at run time.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.AutoArrange%2A>以確保所有項目中您<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>避免重疊，在執行階段自動排列控制項。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the column to resize.
trans-unit.target: 要調整大小的資料行之以零為起始的索引。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeaderAutoResizeStyle" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeaderAutoResizeStyle" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Resizes the width of the given column as indicated by the resize style.
trans-unit.target: 根據調整大小樣式的指示，重新調整指定之資料行的寬度。

trans-unit.source: Calling this method is only effective once the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> and containing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> have been constructed, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> column headers and columns are populated with items.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫這個方法才有效一次<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>和包含<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>已建構和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>資料行標頭和資料行填入項目。

trans-unit.source: If new items are added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>, the columns will not resize unless <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.AutoResizeColumn%2A> is called again.
trans-unit.target: 如果加入新項目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>，資料行不會調整大小除非<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.AutoResizeColumn%2A>會再次呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The following example initializes a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> in detail view and automatically resizes the columns using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.AutoResizeColumn%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會初始化<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>詳細資料檢視中，並自動調整大小的資料行使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.AutoResizeColumn%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: To run this example, paste this code into a Windows Form and call the `InitializeResizingListView` method from the form's constructor or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行此範例中，將此程式碼貼到 Windows Form 並呼叫`InitializeResizingListView`從表單的建構函式的方法或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load>事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="columnIndex" /> is greater than 0 when <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Columns" /> is <see langword="null" />
trans-unit.target: 當 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Columns" /> 為 <see langword="null" /> 時，<paramref name="columnIndex" /> 大於 0

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="columnIndex" /> is less than 0 or greater than the number of columns set.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="columnIndex" /> 小於 0 或大於資料行設定的數目。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="headerAutoResize" /> is not a member of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeaderAutoResizeStyle" /> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="headerAutoResize" /> 不是 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeaderAutoResizeStyle" /> 列舉型別的成員。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeaderAutoResizeStyle" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeaderAutoResizeStyle" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Resizes the width of the columns as indicated by the resize style.
trans-unit.target: 根據調整大小樣式的指示，調整資料行的寬度。

trans-unit.source: Calling this method is only effective once the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> and containing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> have been constructed, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> column headers and columns are populated with items.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫這個方法才有效一次<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>和包含<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>已建構和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>資料行標頭和資料行填入項目。

trans-unit.source: If new items are added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>, the columns will not resize unless <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.AutoResizeColumns%2A> is called again.
trans-unit.target: 如果加入新項目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>，資料行不會調整大小除非<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.AutoResizeColumns%2A>會再次呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates initializing a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> in detail view and automatically resizing the columns using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.AutoResizeColumns%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何初始化<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>在詳細資料檢視] 和 [自動調整大小的資料行使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.AutoResizeColumns%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: To run this example, paste this code into a Windows Form and call the `InitializeResizingListView2` method from the form's constructor or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行此範例中，將此程式碼貼到 Windows Form 並呼叫`InitializeResizingListView2`從表單的建構函式的方法或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load>事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.AutoResizeColumn(System.Int32,System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeaderAutoResizeStyle)" /> is called with a value other than <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeaderAutoResizeStyle.None" /> when <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View" /> is not set to <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.View.Details" />.
trans-unit.target: 當 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.AutoResizeColumn(System.Int32,System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeaderAutoResizeStyle)" /> 未設定為 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeaderAutoResizeStyle.None" /> 時，是用 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View" /> 以外的值呼叫 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.View.Details" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the background color.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定背景色彩。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> of the background.
trans-unit.target: 背景的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ImageLayout" /> value.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ImageLayout" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ImageLayout" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ImageLayout" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: This property has no effect on the layout of the background image of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control, therefore it is not shown in the designer or by IntelliSense.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性就沒有作用的背景影像的配置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>控制項，因此它不會顯示在設計工具或 intellisense。

trans-unit.source: The value specified is not one of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ImageLayout" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 指定的值不是其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ImageLayout" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.BackgroundImageLayout" /> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 發生於 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.BackgroundImageLayout" /> 屬性變更時。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the background image of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListView" /> should be tiled.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListView" /> 的背景影像是否應該並排顯示。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the background image of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListView" /> should be tiled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListView" /> 的背景影像應該並排顯示，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.BackgroundImageTiled%2A> property returns `false` if an image is not set.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.BackgroundImageTiled%2A>屬性會傳回`false`如果未設定映像。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user starts editing the label of an item.
trans-unit.target: 發生於使用者開始編輯項目的標籤時。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.BeforeLabelEdit> event occurs when the user starts modifying the text for an item.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.BeforeLabelEdit>當使用者開始修改項目的文字，就會發生事件。

trans-unit.source: If the event handler cancels this event, the user cannot edit the text.
trans-unit.target: 如果事件處理常式取消這個事件，使用者無法編輯文字。

trans-unit.source: You can use this event to prevent the user from editing specific items in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用此事件，若要防止使用者編輯中的特定項目的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.LabelEdit%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control is set to `false`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.BeforeLabelEdit> event is not raised; all user attempts to edit item labels are automatically rejected.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.LabelEdit%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>控制設為 `false`、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.BeforeLabelEdit>不會引發事件; 若要編輯的項目標籤的所有使用者嘗試都會自動都遭拒。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates handling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.BeforeLabelEdit> event and using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LabelEditEventArgs.Item%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LabelEditEventArgs.CancelEdit%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> properties.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範處理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.BeforeLabelEdit>事件並使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LabelEditEventArgs.Item%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LabelEditEventArgs.CancelEdit%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性。

trans-unit.source: To run the example, paste the following code into a form that contains a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control named `ListView1` and populated with at least three items.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行此範例，將下列程式碼貼到表單，其中包含<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>控制項，名為`ListView1`並填入至少三個項目。

trans-unit.source: Ensure the event handler in the example is associated with its event.
trans-unit.target: 請在範例中的事件處理常式相關聯的事件。

trans-unit.source: Prevents the control from drawing until the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.EndUpdate" /> method is called.
trans-unit.target: 直到 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.EndUpdate" /> 方法呼叫前，防止控制項被繪製。

trans-unit.source: The preferred way to add multiple items to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> is to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection.AddRange%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection> (accessed through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Items%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>).
trans-unit.target: 新增多個項目，最好<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>是使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection.AddRange%2A>方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection>(透過存取<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Items%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>)。

trans-unit.source: This enables you to add an array of items to the list in a single operation.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓您將項目陣列加入至單一作業中的清單。

trans-unit.source: However, if you want to add items one at a time using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection.Add%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection> class, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.BeginUpdate%2A> method to prevent the control from repainting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> every time that an item is added.
trans-unit.target: 不過，如果您想要加入的項目一於使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection.Add%2A>方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection>類別，您可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.BeginUpdate%2A>方法，以防止重繪控制項<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>每個項目加入的時間。

trans-unit.source: When you have completed the task of adding items to the control, call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.EndUpdate%2A> method to enable the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> to repaint.
trans-unit.target: 當您已完成的工作項目加入控制項時，呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.EndUpdate%2A>方法，以啟用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>來重新繪製。

trans-unit.source: This way of adding items can prevent flickered drawing of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> when lots of items are being added to the control.
trans-unit.target: 加入項目可以防止這種 flickered 繪圖的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>當正在許多項目加入至控制項。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.BeginUpdate%2A> is called more than once, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.EndUpdate%2A> must be called an equivalent number of times.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.BeginUpdate%2A>呼叫一次以上，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.EndUpdate%2A>必須呼叫的對等的次數。

trans-unit.source: Until the last call to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.EndUpdate%2A> the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> will not repaint.
trans-unit.target: 最後一個呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.EndUpdate%2A><xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>將不會重新繪製。

trans-unit.source: Other than this, multiple calls to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.BeginUpdate%2A> have no effect.
trans-unit.target: 此外，多個呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.BeginUpdate%2A>沒有作用。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates initializing a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control to contain check boxes.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何初始化<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>控制項包含核取方塊。

trans-unit.source: It also demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.BeginUpdate%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.EndUpdate%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 它也會示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.BeginUpdate%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.EndUpdate%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: To run this example, paste the following code into a form that contains a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> named `ListView1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行此範例中，將下列程式碼貼到表單，其中包含<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>名為`ListView1`。

trans-unit.source: Call the `InititalizeListView` method from the form's constructor or `Load` method.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫`InititalizeListView`從表單的建構函式的方法或`Load`方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the border style of the control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定控制項的框線樣式。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle.Fixed3D" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle.Fixed3D" />。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.BorderStyle%2A> property to change the border style of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control to match the border style settings of other controls on the form.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.BorderStyle%2A>要變更的框線樣式屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>控制要比對表單上其他控制項的框線樣式設定。

trans-unit.source: For example, if none of the other controls on your form displays a border, you can set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.BorderStyle%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle.None> to match the other controls.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果沒有任何其他控制項在表單上顯示框線，您可以設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.BorderStyle%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>控制權傳輸至<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle.None>以符合其他的控制項。

trans-unit.source: The value specified is not one of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 指定的值不是其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the contents of the display area for a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListView" /> in virtual mode has changed, and the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListView" /> determines that a new range of items is needed.
trans-unit.target: 當已變更虛擬模式中 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListView" /> 的顯示區域內容，而且 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListView" /> 判斷需要新的項目範圍時發生。

trans-unit.source: This event only occurs when <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.VirtualMode%2A> is `true`.
trans-unit.target: 只會發生此事件時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.VirtualMode%2A>是`true`。

trans-unit.source: Handling this event allows the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> to update the item information held in the cache so that it is readily available.
trans-unit.target: 處理此事件可讓<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>更新項目資訊保留在快取，讓它隨時可用。

trans-unit.source: This can improve performance on large lists, or lists whose items are expensive to calculate.
trans-unit.target: 這可以改善大型清單或清單，其中的項目是相當費時計算的效能。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: In the example, the event handler checks to make sure a cache refresh is really necessary, and then rebuilds the cache.
trans-unit.target: 在範例中，事件處理常式會檢查以確定快取重新整理真有必要，然後再重建快取。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.VirtualMode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.VirtualMode%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether a check box appears next to each item in the control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出控制項中每個項目的旁邊是否要出現核取方塊。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if a check box appears next to each item in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListView" /> control; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListView" /> 控制項中每個項目的旁邊都要出現核取方塊，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckBoxes%2A> property allows you to display a check box next to each item in the list.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckBoxes%2A>屬性可讓您顯示清單中的每個項目旁的核取方塊。

trans-unit.source: This enables your application to display a list of items (and subitems if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A> property is set to `View.Details`) that the user can select by clicking the check box.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓您的應用程式，以顯示項目清單 (如果 subitems 和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A>屬性設定為`View.Details`)，使用者可以選取核取方塊，即可。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckBoxes%2A> property offers a way to select multiple items in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control without using the CTRL key.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckBoxes%2A>屬性提供一種方式選取多個項目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>控制項，而不需要使用 CTRL 鍵。

trans-unit.source: Depending on your application, using check boxes to select items rather than the standard multiple selection method may be easier for the user.
trans-unit.target: 根據您的應用程式使用核取方塊選取項目，而不是標準的多個選取的方法可能會讓使用者更容易。

trans-unit.source: Even if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.MultiSelect%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control is set to `false`, you can still display checkboxes and provide multiple selection capabilities to the user.
trans-unit.target: 即使<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.MultiSelect%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>控制設為 `false`，您仍可以顯示核取方塊並提供給使用者的多個選取的功能。

trans-unit.source: This feature can be useful if you do not want multiple items to be selected yet still want to allow the user to choose multiple items from the list to perform an operation within your application.
trans-unit.target: 如果您不想要選取多個項目但仍想要允許使用者執行您的應用程式內的作業清單中選擇多個項目，這項功能十分有用。

trans-unit.source: To determine when an item has been checked, create an event handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ItemCheck> event.
trans-unit.target: 若要判斷時已檢查的項目，建立事件處理常式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ItemCheck>事件。

trans-unit.source: To get all the items that are checked in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckedItems%2A> property to access the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckedIndexCollection> for the control.
trans-unit.target: 若要取得已簽入的所有項目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckedItems%2A>屬性來存取<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckedIndexCollection>控制項。

trans-unit.source: To get the indexes of all items that are checked in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckedIndices%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要取得已簽入的所有項目的索引<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckedIndices%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: If an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> is specified in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.StateImageList%2A> property, the images at index positions 0 and 1 in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> are displayed instead of the check box.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>中指定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.StateImageList%2A>屬性，在 0 和 1 中的索引位置的映像<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>而不是核取方塊會顯示。

trans-unit.source: The image at index position 0 is displayed instead of the unchecked check box, and the image at index position 1 is displayed instead of the checked check box.
trans-unit.target: 而不是未檢查的核取方塊，顯示的影像的索引位置 0，而不是已核取核取方塊會顯示的索引位置 1 的影像。

trans-unit.source: When you set this property to `true`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ItemCheck> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 當您將此屬性設定為`true`、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ItemCheck>就會發生事件。

trans-unit.source: Check boxes are not displayed when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View.Tile>.
trans-unit.target: 核取方塊不會顯示當<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A>屬性設定為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.View.Tile>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control with three <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> objects specified and three <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem> objects specified for each item.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會建立<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>控制項具有三個<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>所指定的物件和三個<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>針對每個項目指定的物件。

trans-unit.source: The example also creates <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader> objects to display the subitems in details view.
trans-unit.target: 此範例也會建立<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader>物件詳細資料檢視中顯示子項目。

trans-unit.source: Two <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> objects are also created in the code example to provide images for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> objects.
trans-unit.target: 兩個<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>物件也會建立在程式碼範例中提供的映像<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>物件。

trans-unit.source: These <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> objects are added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.LargeImageList%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SmallImageList%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 這些<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>物件加入至<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.LargeImageList%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SmallImageList%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The example uses the following properties in creating the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: 此範例會使用下列屬性建立<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: This example requires that you have added the code to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> and call the method created in the example from the constructor or another method on the form.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例需要您已加入的程式碼<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>並呼叫從建構函式或在表單上的另一個方法範例中所建立的方法。

trans-unit.source: The example also requires that images named `MySmallImage1`, `MySmallImage2`, `MyLargeImage1`, and `MyLargeImage2` are located in the root directory of drive C.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例也會需要映像命名為`MySmallImage1`， `MySmallImage2`， `MyLargeImage1`，和`MyLargeImage2`位於 c 磁碟機的根目錄

trans-unit.source: Gets the indexes of the currently checked items in the control.
trans-unit.target: 取得控制項中目前選取項目的索引。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckedIndexCollection" /> that contains the indexes of the currently checked items.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckedIndexCollection" />，包含目前所選取項目的索引。

trans-unit.source: If no items are currently checked, an empty <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckedIndexCollection" /> is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果目前並未選取項目，則傳回空白的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckedIndexCollection" />。

trans-unit.source: This property is only useful when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckBoxes%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性時，才有用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckBoxes%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>控制設為 `true`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckedIndices%2A> property returns a collection that contains the index positions in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection> of all items that are checked in the control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckedIndices%2A>屬性會傳回集合，其中包含的索引位置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection>會檢查在控制項中的所有項目。

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to manipulate the items in the collection, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckedIndexCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何管理集合中的項目，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckedIndexCollection>。

trans-unit.source: If you want to obtain a collection of the items that are checked in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control, instead of the index positions of the items that are checked, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckedItems%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要取得的簽入的項目集合<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>控制項，而不是索引位置的項目會檢查使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckedItems%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets the currently checked items in the control.
trans-unit.target: 取得控制項中目前選取的項目。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckedListViewItemCollection" /> that contains the currently checked items.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckedListViewItemCollection" />，包含目前選取的項目。

trans-unit.source: If no items are currently checked, an empty <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckedListViewItemCollection" /> is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果目前並未選取項目，則傳回空白的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckedListViewItemCollection" />。

trans-unit.source: This property is only useful when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckBoxes%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性時，才有用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckBoxes%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>控制設為 `true`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckedItems%2A> property returns a collection that contains all items that are checked in the control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckedItems%2A>屬性會傳回集合，其中包含已在控制項中的所有項目。

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to manipulate the items in the collection, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckedListViewItemCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何管理集合中的項目，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckedListViewItemCollection>。

trans-unit.source: If you want to obtain a collection of the index positions within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection> of the items that are checked in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control, instead of the items that are checked, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckedIndices%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要取得集合中的索引位置的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection>簽入的項目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>控制項，而不是項目會檢查使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckedIndices%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates a checked <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> that handles the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ItemChecked> event.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何檢查<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>可處理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ItemChecked>事件。

trans-unit.source: The example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckedItems%2A> property to tally a new price every time that an item is checked or unchecked.
trans-unit.target: 此範例會使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CheckedItems%2A>屬性来記錄項目是 checked 或 unchecked 每次新的價格。

trans-unit.source: To run this example, paste the following code into a form that contains a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> named `ListView1` and a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> named `Textbox1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行此範例中，將下列程式碼貼到表單，其中包含<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>名為`ListView1`和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>名為`Textbox1`。

trans-unit.source: Call the `InititalizeListView` method from the form's constructor or `Load` method.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫`InititalizeListView`從表單的建構函式的方法或`Load`方法。

trans-unit.source: Removes all items and columns from the control.
trans-unit.target: 將控制項中所有的項目和資料行全部移除。

trans-unit.source: You can use this method to remove all items and columns from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control without having to call the individual `Clear` methods from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnHeaderCollection> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection> classes.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個方法來移除所有項目和資料行從<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>控制項，而不必呼叫個別`Clear`方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnHeaderCollection>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection>類別。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Clear%2A> method does not clear <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups%2A> specified for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Clear%2A>方法不會清除<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups%2A>指定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: To clear <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups%2A> call <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.Clear%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 若要清除<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Groups%2A>呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewGroupCollection.Clear%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Clear%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.Selected%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> members.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Clear%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.Selected%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>成員。

trans-unit.source: To run this example, paste the following code into a form that contains a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> named `ListView1` and a button, located toward the bottom of the form, named `Button1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行此範例中，將下列程式碼貼到表單，其中包含<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>名為`ListView1`和按鈕，位於名為表單底部`Button1`。

trans-unit.source: Call the `InitializeListView` method from the form's constructor or `Load` method.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫`InitializeListView`從表單的建構函式的方法或`Load`方法。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user clicks a column header within the list view control.
trans-unit.target: 發生於使用者按一下清單檢視控制項中的資料行標頭時。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnClick> event occurs when the user clicks one of the column headers in a details view of the items in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control (when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View.Details>).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnClick>使用者按一下其中一個資料行中的標頭的詳細資料檢視中的項目時，就會發生事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>控制項 (當<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A>屬性設定為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.View.Details>)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnClick> event is typically handled to sort the items in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> using the clicked column as the column to sort by.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnClick>事件通常用於排序的項目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>使用按資料行的資料行，來排序。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a form that contains a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control that manually sorts items when a column in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會建立包含表單的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>手動排序項目中的資料行時的控制項<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>按一下控制項時。

trans-unit.source: The example defines a class called `ListViewItemComparer` that implements the <xref:System.Collections.IComparer?displayProperty=nameWithType> interface that performs the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> comparison.
trans-unit.target: 此範例會定義一種類別稱為`ListViewItemComparer`實作<xref:System.Collections.IComparer?displayProperty=nameWithType>介面執行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>比較。

trans-unit.source: The example creates an instance of `ListViewItemComparer` and uses it to set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemSorter%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: 此範例會建立的執行個體`ListViewItemComparer`並使用它來設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemSorter%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Sort%2A> method call in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnClick> event handler uses the methods defined in `ListViewItemComparer` to perform the sort of items, based on the column that is clicked.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Sort%2A>方法呼叫中<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnClick>事件處理常式的使用中定義的方法`ListViewItemComparer`來執行的項目，根據按下的資料行排序。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the column header order is changed.
trans-unit.target: 發生於資料行標頭順序已變更時。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnReordered> event is a cancelable event and can be canceled by handling the event and setting the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnReordered>事件可取消事件，且可以處理事件和設定取消<xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>屬性`true`。

trans-unit.source: However, if the event is canceled, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnReorderedEventArgs.NewDisplayIndex%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnReorderedEventArgs> will not change to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnReorderedEventArgs.OldDisplayIndex%2A> value.
trans-unit.target: 不過，如果事件已取消，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnReorderedEventArgs.NewDisplayIndex%2A>的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnReorderedEventArgs>不會變更為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnReorderedEventArgs.OldDisplayIndex%2A>值。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnReordered> event.
trans-unit.target: 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnReordered>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>與<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或將訊息附加到多行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> named `ListView1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>名為`ListView1`。

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnReordered> event.
trans-unit.target: 請確定事件處理常式關聯<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnReordered>事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of all column headers that appear in the control.
trans-unit.target: 取得控制項中顯示的所有資料行標頭的集合。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnHeaderCollection" /> that represents the column headers that appear when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View" /> property is set to <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.View.Details" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnHeaderCollection" />，表示當 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View" /> 屬性設定為 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.View.Details" /> 時顯示的資料行行首。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Columns%2A> property returns a collection that contains the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader> objects that are displayed in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Columns%2A>屬性會傳回集合，其中包含<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader>物件中所顯示的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader> objects define the columns that are displayed in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View.Details>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader> 物件定義的資料行中所顯示的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>負責控制何時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A>屬性設定為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.View.Details>。

trans-unit.source: Each column is used to display subitem information for each item in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>.
trans-unit.target: 每個資料行用來顯示每個項目中的子項目資訊<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>。

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to manipulate the items in the collection, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnHeaderCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何管理集合中的項目，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnHeaderCollection>。

trans-unit.source: If your <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control does not have any column headers specified and you set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A> property to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View.Details>, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control will not display any items.
trans-unit.target: 如果您<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>控制項沒有指定任何資料行標頭，而且您設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.View.Details>、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>控制項不會顯示任何項目。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control with three <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> objects specified and three <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem> objects specified for each item.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會建立<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>控制項具有三個<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>所指定的物件和三個<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem>針對每個項目指定的物件。

trans-unit.source: The example also creates <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader> objects to display the subitems in details view.
trans-unit.target: 此範例也會建立<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader>物件詳細資料檢視中顯示子項目。

trans-unit.source: Two <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> objects are also created in the code example to provide images for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> objects.
trans-unit.target: 兩個<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>物件也會建立在程式碼範例中提供的映像<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>物件。

trans-unit.source: These <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> objects are added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.LargeImageList%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SmallImageList%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 這些<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>物件加入至<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.LargeImageList%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SmallImageList%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The example uses the following properties in creating the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: 此範例會使用下列屬性建立<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: This example requires that you have added the code to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> and call the method created in the example from the constructor or another method on the form.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例需要您已加入的程式碼<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>並呼叫從建構函式或在表單上的另一個方法範例中所建立的方法。

trans-unit.source: The example also requires that images named `MySmallImage1`, `MySmallImage2`, `MyLargeImage1`, and `MyLargeImage2` are located in the root directory of drive C.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例也會需要映像命名為`MySmallImage1`， `MySmallImage2`， `MyLargeImage1`，和`MyLargeImage2`位於 c 磁碟機的根目錄

trans-unit.source: Occurs after the width of a column is successfully changed.
trans-unit.target: 發生於成功變更資料行寬度後。

trans-unit.source: This event will not occur if the column width change is canceled in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnWidthChanging> event
trans-unit.target: 如果變更資料行寬度以取消不會發生此事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnWidthChanging>事件

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>與<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或將訊息附加到多行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> named `ListView1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>名為`ListView1`。

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnWidthChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 請確定事件處理常式關聯<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnWidthChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the width of a column is changing.
trans-unit.target: 發生於資料行的寬度變更時。

trans-unit.source: This event allows you to check the new column width with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnWidthChangingEventArgs.NewWidth%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property, and cancel the event if you choose by setting the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 此事件可讓您檢查與新的資料行寬度<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnWidthChangingEventArgs.NewWidth%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性，並取消事件，如果您選擇藉由設定<xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>屬性`true`。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範處理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnWidthChanging>事件。

trans-unit.source: It also demonstrates the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnWidthChangingEventArgs.NewWidth%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> members.
trans-unit.target: 它也會示範<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnWidthChangingEventArgs.NewWidth%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>和<xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>成員。

trans-unit.target: 若要執行此範例中，貼在 Windows Form 中的程式碼。

trans-unit.target: 呼叫`InitializeListView1`從表單的建構函式或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load>事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: Creates a handle for the control.
trans-unit.target: 建立控制項的控制代碼。

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant for this class.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性與這個類別無關。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="null" /> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: 所有情況下都是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant for this class.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性與這個類別無關。

trans-unit.source: Gets the default size of the control.
trans-unit.target: 取得控制項的預設大小。

trans-unit.source: The default <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> of the control.
trans-unit.target: 控制項的預設 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <see langword="false" /> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示釋放 Managed 和 Unmanaged 資源，<see langword="false" /> 則表示只釋放 Unmanaged 資源。

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListView" /> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: 釋放 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListView" /> 所使用的 Unmanaged 資源，並選擇性地釋放 Managed 資源。

trans-unit.source: Call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Dispose%2A> method when the component is no longer needed.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Dispose%2A>方法不再需要的元件時。

trans-unit.source: This method removes the component from its container (if the component has a site) and triggers the dispose event.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會移除該元件從其容器 （如果元件有站台） 並處置事件觸發程序。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this control should redraw its surface using a secondary buffer to reduce or prevent flicker.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出這個控制項是否應使用次要緩衝區重繪其介面，以減少或防止重繪閃動 (Flicker)。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the surface of the control should be drawn using double buffering; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果應該使用雙重緩衝繪製控制項的介面，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the details view of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListView" /> is drawn and the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.OwnerDraw" /> property is set to <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 當已繪製 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListView" /> 的詳細資料檢視而且 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.OwnerDraw" /> 屬性設定為 <see langword="true" /> 時發生。

trans-unit.source: This event lets you customize the appearance of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control using owner drawing.
trans-unit.target: 此事件可讓您自訂的外觀<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>使用主控描繪控制項。

trans-unit.source: It is raised only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.OwnerDraw%2A> property is set to `true` and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View.Details?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 會引發此事件時，才<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.OwnerDraw%2A>屬性設定為`true`和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A>屬性設定為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.View.Details?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: This event can occur for each column header in the control.
trans-unit.target: 在控制項中的每個資料行標頭，可能會發生此事件。

trans-unit.source: For more information on owner drawing, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.OwnerDraw%2A> property reference topic.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關主控描繪的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.OwnerDraw%2A>屬性參考主題。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example provides an implementation of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawColumnHeader> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例提供的實作<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawColumnHeader>事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: For the complete example, including the implementation of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawSubItem> event handler, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.OwnerDraw%2A> reference topic.
trans-unit.target: 完整的範例，包括實作<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawSubItem>事件處理常式，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.OwnerDraw%2A>參考主題。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListView" /> is drawn and the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.OwnerDraw" /> property is set to <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 當已繪製 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListView" /> 而且 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.OwnerDraw" /> 屬性設定為 <see langword="true" /> 時發生。

trans-unit.source: This event lets you customize the appearance of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control using owner drawing.
trans-unit.target: 此事件可讓您自訂的外觀<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>使用主控描繪控制項。

trans-unit.source: It is raised only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.OwnerDraw%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 會引發此事件時，才<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.OwnerDraw%2A>屬性設定為`true`。

trans-unit.source: For more information about owner drawing, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.OwnerDraw%2A> property reference topic.
trans-unit.target: 如需主控描繪的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.OwnerDraw%2A>屬性參考主題。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawItem> event can occur for each <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> item.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawItem>每個可能會發生事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>項目。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View.Details?displayProperty=nameWithType>, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawSubItem> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawColumnHeader> events also occur.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A>屬性設定為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.View.Details?displayProperty=nameWithType>、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawSubItem>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawColumnHeader>也會發生的事件。

trans-unit.source: In this case, you can handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawItem> event to draw elements common to all items, such as the background, and handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawSubItem> event to draw elements for individual subitems, such as text values.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，您可以處理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawItem>來繪製所有項目，例如背景通用的項目，以及處理事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawSubItem>事件，以繪製為個別的子項目，例如文字值的項目。

trans-unit.source: You can also draw all items in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control using only one of the two events, although this may be less convenient.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以繪製所有項目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>雖然這可能是較不方便使用的兩個事件，其中之一的控制。

trans-unit.source: To draw column headers in the details view, you must handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawColumnHeader> event.
trans-unit.target: 若要繪製詳細資料檢視中的資料行標頭，您必須處理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawColumnHeader>事件。

trans-unit.source: Because of a bug in the underlying Win32 control, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawItem> event occurs without accompanying <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawSubItem> events once per row in the details view when the mouse pointer moves over the row, causing anything painted in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawSubItem> event handler to be painted over by a custom background drawn in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawItem> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 因為在基礎 Win32 控制項中，錯誤<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawItem>發生事件時，建議您同時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawSubItem>事件一次每個資料列詳細資料檢視，當滑鼠指標移到資料列時，造成任何項目中繪製<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawSubItem>是事件處理常式移轉中繪製自訂背景繪製<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawItem>事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: See the example in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.OwnerDraw%2A> reference topic for a workaround that invalidates each row when the extra event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱中的範例<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.OwnerDraw%2A>使每個資料列，就會發生額外的事件時的因應措施的參考主題。

trans-unit.source: An alternative workaround is to put all your custom drawing code in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawSubItem> event handler and paint the background for the entire item (including subitems) only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.ColumnIndex%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> value is 0.
trans-unit.target: 一種解決方法是將所有自訂繪圖程式碼置於<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawSubItem>事件處理常式和繪製整個項目 （包括子項目） 的背景時，才<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewSubItemEventArgs.ColumnIndex%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>值為 0。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example provides an implementation of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawItem> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例提供的實作<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawItem>事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: For the complete example, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.OwnerDraw%2A> reference topic.
trans-unit.target: 完整的範例，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.OwnerDraw%2A>參考主題。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the details view of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListView" /> is drawn and the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.OwnerDraw" /> property is set to <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 當已繪製 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListView" /> 的詳細資料檢視而且 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.OwnerDraw" /> 屬性設定為 <see langword="true" /> 時發生。

trans-unit.source: This event lets you customize the appearance of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control using owner drawing.
trans-unit.target: 此事件可讓您自訂的外觀<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>使用主控描繪控制項。

trans-unit.source: It is raised only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.OwnerDraw%2A> property is set to `true` and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View.Details?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 會引發此事件時，才<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.OwnerDraw%2A>屬性設定為`true`和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A>屬性設定為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.View.Details?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: For more information on owner drawing, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.OwnerDraw%2A> property reference topic.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關主控描繪的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.OwnerDraw%2A>屬性參考主題。

trans-unit.source: Subitem information typically appears in the tile view as well as the details view, but in the tile view, it must be drawn in a handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawItem> event.
trans-unit.target: 子項目資訊通常會出現在並排顯示檢視，以及詳細資料檢視，但在並排顯示檢視，它必須繪製的處理常式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawItem>事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawSubItem> event can occur for each <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> subitem.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawSubItem>每個可能會發生事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>子項目。

trans-unit.source: You can handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawItem> event to draw elements common to all subitems, such as the background, and handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawSubItem> event to draw elements for individual subitems, such as text values.
trans-unit.target: 您可以處理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawItem>事件的所有子項目，例如背景繪製通用的項目，並處理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawSubItem>事件，以繪製為個別的子項目，例如文字值的項目。

trans-unit.source: You can also draw all items in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control using only one of the two events, although this may be less convenient.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以繪製所有項目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>雖然這可能是較不方便使用的兩個事件，其中之一的控制。

trans-unit.source: To draw column headers in the details view, you must handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawColumnHeader> event.
trans-unit.target: 若要繪製詳細資料檢視中的資料行標頭，您必須處理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawColumnHeader>事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawSubItem> event does not occur for any subitems for which no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader> object has been added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Columns%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawSubItem>事件不會發生任何子項目，且未<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnHeader>物件已加入至<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Columns%2A>集合。

trans-unit.source: Note also that the first subitem of each <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> object represents the parent item itself, and is displayed in the first column.
trans-unit.target: 也請注意，第一個子項目，每個<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>物件表示父項目本身，而且會顯示在第一個資料行。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example provides an implementation of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawSubItem> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例提供的實作<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawSubItem>事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: For the complete example, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.OwnerDraw%2A> reference topic.
trans-unit.target: 完整的範例，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.OwnerDraw%2A>參考主題。

trans-unit.source: Resumes drawing of the list view control after drawing is suspended by the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.BeginUpdate" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 繪製被 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.BeginUpdate" /> 方法暫止之後，恢復執行清單檢視控制項的繪製。

trans-unit.source: The preferred way to add multiple items to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> is to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection.AddRange%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection> (accessed through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Items%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>).
trans-unit.target: 新增多個項目，最好<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>是使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection.AddRange%2A>方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection>(透過存取<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Items%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>)。

trans-unit.source: This enables you to add an array of items to the list in a single operation.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓您將項目陣列加入至單一作業中的清單。

trans-unit.source: However, if you want to add items one at a time using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection.Add%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection> class, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.BeginUpdate%2A> method to prevent the control from repainting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> each time an item is added.
trans-unit.target: 不過，如果您想要加入的項目一於使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection.Add%2A>方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ListViewItemCollection>類別，您可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.BeginUpdate%2A>方法，以防止重繪控制項<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>每次在加入項目。

trans-unit.source: Once you have completed the task of adding items to the control, call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.EndUpdate%2A> method to enable the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> to repaint.
trans-unit.target: 一旦您已完成的工作項目加入控制項，呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.EndUpdate%2A>方法，以啟用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>來重新繪製。

trans-unit.source: This way of adding items can prevent flickered drawing of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> when a large number of items are being added to the control.
trans-unit.target: 加入項目可以防止這種 flickered 繪圖的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>當正在大量項目加入至控制項。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.BeginUpdate%2A> is called more than once, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.EndUpdate%2A> must be called an equivalent number of times.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.BeginUpdate%2A>呼叫一次以上，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.EndUpdate%2A>必須呼叫的對等的次數。

trans-unit.source: Until the last call to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.EndUpdate%2A> the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> will not repaint.
trans-unit.target: 最後一個呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.EndUpdate%2A><xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>將不會重新繪製。

trans-unit.source: Other than this, multiple calls to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.BeginUpdate%2A> have no effect.
trans-unit.target: 此外，多個呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.BeginUpdate%2A>沒有作用。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates initializing a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control to contain check boxes.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何初始化<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>控制項包含核取方塊。

trans-unit.source: It also demonstrates using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.BeginUpdate%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.EndUpdate%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 它也示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.BeginUpdate%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.EndUpdate%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: To run this example, paste the following code into a form containing a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> named `ListView1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行此範例中，將下列程式碼貼到表單，其中包含<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>名為`ListView1`。

trans-unit.source: Call the `InititalizeListView` method from the form's constructor or `Load` method.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫`InititalizeListView`從表單的建構函式的方法或`Load`方法。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the item to scroll into view.
trans-unit.target: 要捲動進入檢視之項目的以零為起始的索引。

trans-unit.source: Ensures that the specified item is visible within the control, scrolling the contents of the control if necessary.
trans-unit.target: 確保特定項目在控制項中可見，必要時捲動控制項的內容。

trans-unit.source: You can use this method to ensure that a specific item is visible within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個方法，以確保特定項目中可以看見<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: When performing validation on the items in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>, you can call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.EnsureVisible%2A> method to ensure that an item that failed validation is displayed in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control to allow the user to perform changes on the item.
trans-unit.target: 中的項目上執行驗證時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>，您可以呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.EnsureVisible%2A>方法，以確保驗證失敗的項目會顯示在<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>控制項即可允許使用者執行的項目上的變更。

trans-unit.source: If the item that you want to ensure is visible is located above the viewable region of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control, calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.EnsureVisible%2A> method will scroll the contents of the control until it is the first item in the viewable area of the control.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要確保的項目會顯示位於可檢視區域的上方<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>控制，請呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.EnsureVisible%2A>方法會捲動控制項的內容，直到控制項可檢視區域中的第一個項目。

trans-unit.source: If the item is below the viewable region of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control, calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.EnsureVisible%2A> method will scroll the contents of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control until the item is the last item in the viewable area of the control.
trans-unit.target: 如果項目可檢視區域的以下<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>控制，請呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.EnsureVisible%2A>方法會捲動內容的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>控制直到項目控制項可檢視區域中的最後一個項目。

trans-unit.source: To determine if an item is located at the top of the display area of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.TopItem%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要判斷項目是否位於頂端的顯示區域的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>控制，請使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.TopItem%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Finds the first <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem" /> with that begins with the given text value.
trans-unit.target: 找尋第一個以指定之文字值開始的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem" />。

trans-unit.source: The text to search for.
trans-unit.target: 要搜尋的文字。

trans-unit.source: Finds the first <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem" /> that begins with the specified text value.
trans-unit.target: 找尋第一個以指定之文字值開始的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem" />。

trans-unit.source: The first <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem" /> that begins with the specified text value.
trans-unit.target: 第一個以指定之文字值開始的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem" />。

trans-unit.source: The search is case-insensitive.
trans-unit.target: 搜尋不區分大小寫。

trans-unit.source: The `text` parameter can specify a substring of the desired matching text.
trans-unit.target: `text`參數可以指定想要的相符文字的子字串。

trans-unit.source: In addition, this method will return the first item that starts with the specified text.
trans-unit.target: 此外，這個方法會傳回以指定的文字為開頭的第一個項目。

trans-unit.source: For example, if a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> contains two list items—the first item's text set to "angle bracket" and the second item's text set to "bracket"—a call to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FindItemWithText%2A> passing `brack` as the parameter will return the item whose text is "bracket".
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>包含兩個清單項目-設定為"角括號 」 與第二個項目文字的第一個項目文字設定為"bracket"— 呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FindItemWithText%2A>傳遞`brack`作為參數傳回的文字是"bracket"的項目。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FindItemWithText%2A> method returns `null` if the list is empty or there is no matching item.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FindItemWithText%2A>方法會傳回`null`如果清單是空的或沒有相符的項目。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FindItemWithText%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FindItemWithText%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: To run this example, paste the following code into a Windows Form and call the `InitializeFindListView` method from the form's constructor or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行此範例中，將下列程式碼貼到 Windows Form 並呼叫`InitializeFindListView`從表單的建構函式的方法或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load>事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: Click the button to see the results of the method call.
trans-unit.target: 按一下按鈕即可查看方法呼叫的結果。

trans-unit.source: The text to search for.
trans-unit.target: 要搜尋的文字。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to include subitems in the search; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示要將子項目包含於搜尋之中，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The index of the item at which to start the search.
trans-unit.target: 要開始進行搜尋的項目索引。

trans-unit.source: Finds the first <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem" /> or <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem" />, if indicated, that begins with the specified text value.
trans-unit.target: 如果有指示，則找尋第一個以指定之文字值開始的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem" /> 或 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem" />。

trans-unit.source: The search starts at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 搜尋會從指定的索引開始。

trans-unit.source: The first <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem" /> that begins with the specified text value.
trans-unit.target: 第一個以指定之文字值開始的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem" />。

trans-unit.source: The search is case-insensitive.
trans-unit.target: 搜尋不區分大小寫。

trans-unit.source: The `text` parameter can specify a substring of the desired matching text.
trans-unit.target: `text`參數可以指定想要的相符文字的子字串。

trans-unit.source: In addition, this method will return the first item that starts with the specified text.
trans-unit.target: 此外，這個方法會傳回以指定的文字為開頭的第一個項目。

trans-unit.source: For example, if a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> contains two list items—the first item's text set to "angle bracket" and the second item's text set to "bracket"—a call to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FindItemWithText%2A> passing "brack" as the parameter will return the item whose text is "bracket".
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>包含兩個清單項目-設定為"角括號 」 與第二個項目文字的第一個項目文字設定為"bracket"— 呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FindItemWithText%2A>傳遞"brack 」 參數會傳回項目文字是"bracket"。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FindItemWithText%2A> method returns `null` if the list is empty or there is no matching item.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FindItemWithText%2A>方法會傳回`null`如果清單是空的或沒有相符的項目。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="startIndex" /> is less 0 or more than the number items in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListView" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="startIndex" /> 小於 0 或大於 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListView" /> 中的項目數目。

trans-unit.source: The text to search for.
trans-unit.target: 要搜尋的文字。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to include subitems in the search; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示要將子項目包含於搜尋之中，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The index of the item at which to start the search.
trans-unit.target: 要開始進行搜尋的項目索引。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to allow partial matches; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示允許部分符合的項目，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Finds the first <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem" /> or <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem" />, if indicated, that begins with the specified text value.
trans-unit.target: 如果有指示，則找尋第一個以指定之文字值開始的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem" /> 或 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem" />。

trans-unit.source: The search starts at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 搜尋會從指定的索引開始。

trans-unit.source: The first <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem" /> that begins with the specified text value.
trans-unit.target: 第一個以指定之文字值開始的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FindItemWithText%2A> method returns `null` if the list is empty or there is no matching item.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FindItemWithText%2A>方法會傳回`null`如果清單是空的或沒有相符的項目。

trans-unit.source: The search is case-insensitive.
trans-unit.target: 搜尋不區分大小寫。

trans-unit.source: The `text` parameter can specify a substring of the desired matching text.
trans-unit.target: `text`參數可以指定想要的相符文字的子字串。

trans-unit.source: This method will return the first item that starts with the specified text, unless `false` is passed in for `isPrefixSearch`.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會傳回與指定的文字，開始的第一個項目，除非`false`傳入`isPrefixSearch`。

trans-unit.source: For example, if a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> contains two list items—the first item's text set to "angle bracket" and the second item's text set to "bracket"—a call to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FindItemWithText%2A> passing "brack" as the search text will return the item whose text is "bracket".
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>包含兩個清單項目-設定為"角括號 」 與第二個項目文字的第一個項目文字設定為"bracket"— 呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FindItemWithText%2A>傳遞"brack"作為搜尋文字傳回項目文字是"bracket"。

trans-unit.source: If `isPrefixSearch` is set to `false`, this call will return `null`.
trans-unit.target: 如果`isPrefixSearch`設`false`，此呼叫會傳回`null`。
